sentence: Citrix Systems ( CTXS ) reported mixed results through 2017, following a strong 2016.
The company reported steady revenue growth through 2016 as well as 2017.
However, escalating cost of revenues and operating costs led to lower margins through 2017.
Furthermore, higher tax expenses through the year led to negative net income.
However, on a non-GAAP basis, company reported a steady 9-10% increase in earnings per share.
Strong growth in software-as-a-service (SaaS) revenues is expected to continue through 2018 and help drive overall revenue growth.
Similarly, services revenues also grew at a similar pace through the first half of the fiscal year, which eventually slowed down to single digits in the latter half.
This trend is likely to continue through the current fiscal year as well.
We have summarized our full year expectations for Citrix Systems, based on the company's guidance and our own estimates, on our interactive dashboard platform.
We have used our forecasts to arrive at an $88 price estimate for Citrix Systems based on expected 2018 results, which is slightly below the current market price.
You can change expected segment revenue and price-to-sales multiple figures for Citrix to gauge how changes will impact its valuation.
